name: Hold The Eggs!
description:
TV chefie chef chef Guy Fieri does not like green eggs.

He will not eat them in a house.

He will not eat them with a mouse.

He will not eat them down the drain.

He will not eat them on a plane.

He will not eat them anywhere.

He hates green eggs. He does not care.

But he loves ham.

Guide Guy Am I to the ham (use arrow keys) & pop some ham into Guy Fieri's mouth. You'll regret it if you get too close to the eggs.

A small Bitsy Secret Santa created for Ian.

Images created with Image to Bitsy.

Warning: Contains mild vegan eggs & ham threat & desire.
